content:
To create a mobile app that integrates with an AI-based toolset for content creation, you will likely need the following resources:

1. UI/UX designer: A UI/UX designer will be responsible for creating the user interface and user experience of the mobile app. They will work with the development team to design the layout and flow of the app, as well as the look and feel of the user interface.
2. Mobile app developer: A mobile app developer will be responsible for building the mobile app and integrating it with the AI-based toolset. They will need expertise in the platform(s) you are targeting (e.g. iOS, Android), as well as experience in integrating mobile apps with AI-based systems.
3. AI engineer: An AI engineer will be responsible for building and maintaining the AI-based toolset. They will need expertise in machine learning, data science, and AI-based systems development.

Depending on the complexity of your project, you may also need additional resources such as testers, marketing and sales staff, and customer support staff.

I hope this information is helpful! Let me know if you have any other questions about the resources needed to create a mobile app that integrates with an AI-based toolset for content creation.
